link.description: Welcome to the Getting Started guide! This page will walk you through the essential steps to begin using the FlowSynx system. Whether you're a first-time user or returning for a refresher, you'll find everything you need—from initial setup and installation to key features and usage tips. Let’s get you up and running quickly and confidently. FlowSynx is designed with flexibility and ease of adoption in mind, supporting multiple installation methods to suit different environments, workflows, and user preferences:
